name: web_browser
description: Use our headless chromium browser to browse/scrape the web. Don't use this for getting JSON from an API or Downloading large files use; shell_exec with curl instead for that.

method.description: The http method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc)

items.description: an array of headers to send with the request

responseType.description: The type of response to return default is 'text' which will return only the readable text. (other options text, text+links-inline, text+images-inline, text+links+images-inline
